samakalina deshapalana widyagnya alfrang stefan (kolombiya wishwa widyalaya) 1999 di mema karanayama penwa dun athara eeta udaharanayak washayen ohu shri lankawa genahara dakwiya: ‘fedaralwadaye anagatha anathurak gana biyata path, pradesha washayen gath wita bahu-bhashamaya saha bahu-jathika wana eekiya rajyayak, thaman muhunadun wargika wishamathawan kalamanakaranaya kara gatha nohakiwa, wasara pahalowakatath wada dig gassunu gorathara siwil yuddhayak thula gili giyeya.’
